''"The New Community Center"'' | location = Alabang- Zapote Road, Brgy. Pamplona 2, [[Las PiÃ±as City]], [[Philippines]] | opening_date = October 2, 2009 | developer = [[SM Prime Holdings]] | manager = [[SM Prime Holdings]] | owner = [[Henry Sy|Henry Sy, Sr.]] | gross income = | number_of_buildings =1 | architect = | number_of_stores = 200 shops and restaurants | number_of_anchors = | floor_area = 40,267 | parking = 500 cars | slogan = We've got it all for you! | floors = 2 | website = [http://smsupermalls.com/smsupermalls/index.php?p=651&mall=39 SM Center Las PiÃ±as Official Website] }} '''SM Center Las PiÃ±as''' is a shopping mall owned by SM Prime Holdings located along Alabang-Zapote Road, Pamplona, Las PiÃ±as City, Metro Manila, Philippines. It is the second SM Supermall in Las PiÃ±as after [[SM City Southmall|SM Southmall]]. It is beside the Dragon Mall (Formerly Ever Center) and almost fronting the Las PiÃ±as City Hall. Dubbed as the newest community mall, it opened on October 2, 2009{{cite news|url=http://demo.mci.com.ph/smprime/?p=587&type=2&sec=49&aid=2505/|title=SM to build shopping complex near The Fort|last=Madrilejos-Reyes|first=Honey|date=2009-03-03|publisher=Business Mirror|accessdate=2009-04-03}} with a gross floor area of 40,267 square meters{{cite journal|title=SM Supermalls - Mall Profile|year=2011|month=April|accessdate=8 August 2011}} and features SM brands like the SM Hypermarket, Watsons, and Ace Hardware. This is the second SM Supermall to have no cinemas after [[SM Center Pasig]] ==SM retail stores== *[[SM Hypermarket]] *Ace Hardware *Watsons ==Junior anchors== *[[Banco de Oro]] *Pan de Manila *Tom's World *Bestsellers *Jollibee *Mang Inasal *Astrovision *CafeFrance *Joey Pepperoni *Reyes Barbecue *Yoh-GÃ¼rt Froz *Office Warehouse ==References== {{reflist}} {{S-start}} {{S-bef|before=[[SM City Naga]]}} {{s-ttl|title=35th ''[[SM Supermalls|SM Supermall]]''|years=2009}} {{s-aft|after=[[SM City Rosario]]}} {{S-end}} {{SMPH}} {{Navbox |name = SM Hypermarket Branches |title = [[SM Hypermarket|{{color|#0000A0|SM Hypermarket}}]] |titlegroup = |titlestyle = background:#00FF00; color:#0000A0 |groupstyle = background::#00FF00; color:#0000A0 |group1 = Branches:|
